extendedInfo.description: Control your Roku streaming video player straight from your phone! This app does everything your regular remote can and all sorts of other stuff.If you're having any trouble, PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE RATING. I can't respond to reviews or comments, so if you contact me I can help you out and I know what to change in the next version. Your feedback really does help! This app uses free icons from androidicons.com.â Find and connect to your player in less than 10 seconds without having to manually enter its address - even works with players connected over wifi!â Roku ECP - way more reliable than the old Telnet protocol some other remote apps useâ Full 12-button control including Back and Instant Replayâ List and launch channels directly from your phoneâ Automatically jump to search screens using your phone's search buttonâ Enter text on your phone and send it to the player - never use the on-screen letter picker again!Known issues:â Search and enter text features don't always work with Hulu. This is unfortunately their fault and I can't do anything to work around it.â Some Honeycomb devices are unable to use this app.Roku Inc. does not endorse (or have anything else to do with) this app.For Roku streaming video players only. Not intended for SoundBridge devices.Support further development of this app by purchasing the pro version and enjoy an ad-free experience!http://goo.gl/V44pD

reviews.title: HTC incredible
reviews.comment: Works great on my phone. Does exactly what is says. So much easier to type in searches. I do wish there was more to it but its equal to or better than the remote included with the roku.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than Roku Official app
reviews.comment: Great app, easy to use. This app found my Roku player automatically, unlike the Official Roku app that can\'t find my player.  Works perfectly on Galaxy S2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must
reviews.comment: This is so much more useful and functional than any of the roku remotes.  If you have a roku, try this!  (ad supported)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has never, ever auto-found my R2XS
reviews.comment: On two different phones and several different firmwares, it has never once managed to find the box. Kind of dumb to pick up the real remote to find the IP address every time I want to use this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Works better then the official app I love using this for my roku makes searching a lot easier on Netflix! :) ~ Galaxy S2
reviews.author: Tucker Harris

reviews.title: No problems so far
reviews.comment: It\'s worked out great. Samsung galaxy s2. Auto-detected my roku with no issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I lost my remote, spent 3 hours looking couldnt find it and then I found this app. Thank you so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: Very useful when you can\'t find your remote. The feature that let\'s you send text entered on the phone directly to the roku is nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome...
reviews.comment: This app is pretty cool work great and i never have problems i like i much better than the controller :)
reviews.author: Lytrisha Washington

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: Just be sure to enable wireless first and make sure you are connected to the WAP for a few seconds before launching this app. Will more than likely download the 99\302\242 add free version. The text entry field is reason enough to use this app.....plus its fun to play tricks on my kids from another room.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great! Thanks!
reviews.comment: Works as advertised on my galaxy nexus running ICS. I no longer have to hunt down the regular roku remote after my kids misplace it. My phone is always with me. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Life saver.
reviews.comment: My favorite app. My Roku remote broke and a replacement is costly. This app saved us. Now I can watch netflix again. Thank you so much.
reviews.author: Tina M

reviews.title: Works good but...
reviews.comment: It keeps wifi on even when phone is asleep, which drains battery very fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good remote but...
reviews.comment: Roku\'s own Roku App is out and superior. This app was my go to for my Roku before Roku\'s own app. Also the app hasn\'nt been update to take care of different screen resolutions. Still a good functioning app, just doesn\'t fill the screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE
reviews.comment: Best roku app ever. Works better than my crappy remote!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine
reviews.comment: I just got a roku today, and this remote app works just fine with it.  Roku XD | S , app running on HTC EVO with SOS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flawless
reviews.comment: Worked perfectly on my retired OG Droid running CM7. Instantly detected my box and just worked. I was so happy that I bought the \"pro\" version. I use it in conjunction with an application to keep my WiFi turned on at all times (even with the screen on), so the remote doesn\'t drop the connection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great after manual input
reviews.comment: App could not automatically find my roku, so i just plugged in the ip address in manually by finding it under settings on my roku. Best things are 1. the keyboard use 2. can use it anywhere in the room (does not need line of sight) and 3. can see the remote in the dark (my phone\'s back light). :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great stuff!
reviews.comment: This app works great!  And is a great backup/replacement remote.  Samsung Vibrant 2.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Easy setup. Just wish there was a 1-click text clear option. No biggie, though.
reviews.author: A Google User
